name: Number Twelve, Grimmauld Place
description: Ancestral home of the Black family and, later, the Order of the Phoenix headquarters
residentsOrOwners: Black family, inherited by Harry after Sirius Black's death
peculiarThingsThatLiveHere: Kreacher, the house-elf; the shrieking portrait of Walburga Black; an infestation of Doxys; a Boggart
